name: G+ white(penguindrum)
description:
Background image is from the official website of anime penguindrum.
White. Best resolution is 1280x800.
Flexible-width with white penguindrum patterned  background.

白色调，最佳分辨率1280x800
自适应宽度，默认是企鹅罐的背景图~有待添加~
